1548810.name: illegal Transporter Simulator
1548810.description:
Illegal Transporter Simulator is a game that will allow you to experience real road adventures. Forget about arduous and adrenaline-free driving following the law. Join the most influential gangs in the city and take on the speed challenge.


You are responsible for transport in illegal orders. It doesn't matter if it's simple drug delivery, transporting the body to the forest, or escaping in a van full of cash from the Central City Bank. It is only up to you whether the mission is successful and how much money you will get. Be the fastest, but also the smartest, and outsmart law enforcement in Sunset Bay.


The right car for the right job. The choice of the car and its subsequent metamorphosis depends on you. Learn as much as possible about the assignment, prepare the route and then start customizing your ride. Not only will you be able to turn up the speed, change the color or add a spoiler, but you will also get the option to mount various accessories such as a weapon or other extras. Remember that driving is a skill, but getting your car ready for action requires you to take it seriously.


The open world of the game will allow you to explore the map in advance to obtain information about the area and escape routes. You will be able to verify the spots that are occupied by the cops or rival gangs. Watch out for both of these factions. Some will put you behind bars and end your career, while others will try to take over your goods, and maybe the entire business. Don't trust anyone, don't stop, drive fast straight ahead.

Key features:
  • Open world
  • Deep customization
  • Performance tuning
  • Amazing road experience
  • A wide range of cars
  • Gansters' atmosphere
  • Compatible with steering wheels and gamepads
  • Advanced physics engine allows for extreme realism
1548810.supported_languages: 英语, 波兰语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
